typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MoviesDB
MoviesDB filter(toInteger({Rotton Tomato}) >=51 && toInteger(Rating) <=4) ~> MisMatchedRating
MisMatchedRating aggregate(groupBy(genres),
	Rating = avg(toInteger(Rating))) ~> MisMatchedRatingAvgByGenre
MisMatchedRatingAvgByGenre sink(input(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MisMatchedAvgByRating'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> MisMatchedAvgByRating
MisMatchedRating sink(input(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MisMatchedMovies.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> MisMatchedMovies
MisMatchedRating sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> MisMatchedMoviesJSON
